page.title: 04DRAKES BROUGHTON CHURCH.
page.content: The Church was built in about 1850. There is not a{vicar}at the moment because the old vicar, the Reverend Bernard Palmer, has just retired. There is a Lay Reader and a server at the church. The church{choir}consists of six people, five children and one adult. The choir robes are blue with a white collar. About sixty people attend the church regularly. The vicar, when there is one, is also vicar of Pirton and Stoulton. There is a{Sunday School,}which is held in the church. Every year there is a church fete. The P.C.C. is a church committee, held in the Parish. There is one churchwarden for each church, Drakes Broughton, Pirton and Stoulton.
